articles.description: Erik Ten Hag will remain as manager of Manchester United following a post-season review by the club's board.
articles.title: Erik Ten Hag: Manchester United manager to remain in charge of the club

articles.description: Follow live text commentary, score updates and match stats from Portugal vs Republic of Ireland in an international friendly in Aveiro, Portugal.
articles.title: Portugal vs Republic of Ireland: international friendly

articles.description: Great Britain's Daryll Neita wins women's 200m silver and Megan Keith wins 10,000m bronze at the European Athletics Championships in Rome.
articles.title: European Athletics Championships 2024: Britain's Daryll Neita wins 200m silver

articles.description: Rory McIlroy says he and his wife Erica have "resolved their differences" after dismissing the petition he filed for divorce.
articles.title: Rory McIlroy, Divorce proceedings ended as golfer reconciles with wife Erica

articles.description: Pakistan keep their slim hopes of qualifying for the T20 World Cup Super 8s alive with a seven-wicket win over Canada.
articles.title: T20 World Cup results: Muhammad Rizwan leads Pakistan to win over Canada

articles.description: Follow live text commentary, score updates and match stats from Northern Ireland vs Andorra in an international friendly in Murcia.
articles.title: Northern Ireland vs Andorra: international friendly - BBC Sport

articles.description: Emma Raducanu defies a late wobble to get her grass-court season off to a winning start with a straight sets victory over Japan's Ena Shibahara.
articles.title: Nottingham Open: Emma Raducanu overcomes late wobble to beat Ena Shibahara in straight sets

articles.description: BBC Sport heads to the New York Mets' Citi Life baseball stadium for a special India v Pakistan fan zone.
articles.title: T20 World Cup Video: India and Pakistan fans at New York Mets fan zone - BBC Sport

articles.description: Spaniard Jon Rahm says he "does not know" if the infection affecting his left foot will clear up in time for him to play in this week's major.
articles.title: US Open 2024: Jon Rahm unsure if foot injury will stop him playing at Pinehurst

articles.description: France boss Didier Deschamps won the World Cup as a player and manager and now he is aiming to achieve the same feat in the European Championship.
articles.title: Euro 2024: Didier Deschamps bids to make more history with France
